FuncDef: This command enables and configures the rate for ICMP host and network destination unreachable messages issued on the router interface.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum number of ICMP unreachable messages to send. This parameter must be specified with the seconds parameter. Values-10 to 2000.
Specifies the time frame in seconds used to limit the number of ICMP unreachable messages that can be issued. Values-1 to 60.
